name: 5-schuriBadEnding
commands: After Lilith's defeat, Schuri ran towards Senya's falling body.
Hey...Senya...|Lilith's gone, her control should be dispelled....
She's dead.|She's dead because of you.
Schuri...she was gone.|You saw how Teach was...
No {var:MC_name}, she was never dead.|Control spells only take momentary control of their victims.|Defeating the caster would void it.
You-...you killed her.|The last thing Senya saw was the moment you slit her throat with your blade.|One of her closest friends taking her life.
It's all over...but at what cost?
{var:MC_name}...|To be honest...I've been thinking about many things. About Lilith|About Senya|About us.
We could have prevented this.|She could have lived.|We could have done better.
...but there's no what-ifs left for us.
.....but what if there was?|It's not completely unheard of.
That's is a dangerous line of thinking Schuri...
We can fix this.|...There was rumour where a wizard in the North.|He had holed himself for many years in attempt to revive his loved one.|And there was another mage who dabbled with time-
We have a chance to right this.|It was our-, my fault.|I should have told you about control spells.|I should have considered Senya more.|I should have been stronger.
And...I have the ability to fix this.|No matter how long it will take, I'll......|I'll make it up to them.
I may not be fully on board...but she's really set on this.
Are you sure? Once you start dabbling in these arts, there's no turning back.
I share the same regrets.|If we have the chance...
Great, I'll start the preparations then.
Perhaps this Chalice could prove useful...
I suppose Schuri couldn't handle the loss of two of her closest people.|And started looking into dark magicks.|We eventually left the castle in search of the fabled mages.

Schuri had dove deep into researching dark magicks in desparation.|Or was it despair?|Grief?|Obsession?|Or perhaps it already too late to stop?|Now, all I can do now is to be by her side when the storm passes.
Ending Achieved:|To The Cries of the Damned
source:
#schuri good bond, senya dies
#speak;;this is ending 5;;;narration
music;bittersweetEpilogue
add_portrait;Schuri;OffscreenLeft
speak;;After Lilith's defeat, Schuri ran towards Senya's falling body.;;;narration_top
sound;Light Foot Steps 1
move_portrait;Schuri;Right
add_portrait;MC;Left
expression;Schuri;HalfCloseEyes
expression;MC;CloseEyes
speak;MC;...
expression;MC;HalfCloseEyes
speak;MC;It's over now...
expression;MC;OpenEyes
speak;Schuri;Hey...Senya...|Lilith's gone, her control should be dispelled....
speak;MC;.......|Schuri...
speak;Schuri;.........
mirror_portrait;Schuri
speak;Schuri;She's dead.|She's dead because of you.
speak;MC;Schuri...she was gone.|You saw how Teach was...
speak;Schuri;No {var:MC_name}, she was never dead.|Control spells only take momentary control of their victims.|Defeating the caster would void it.
speak;MC;So what you're saying is...
speak;Schuri;You-...you killed her.|The last thing Senya saw was the moment you slit her throat with your blade.|One of her closest friends taking her life.
expression;MC;HalfCloseEyes
speak;MC;I'm so sorry....
expression;MC;CloseEyes
speak;MC;I didn't know...
move_unit;Schuri;8,3
give_item;Schuri;Argon Chalice (ArgonChalice)
speak;Schuri;...
expression;MC;HalfCloseEyes
speak;MC;...
expression;MC;CloseEyes
speak;MC;It's all over...but at what cost?
wait;500
transition;close;1200
change_background;Hill
multi_remove_portrait;MC;Schuri
transition;open
multi_add_portrait;Schuri;Right;MC;Left
mirror_portrait;Schuri
speak;Schuri;{var:MC_name}...|To be honest...I've been thinking about many things. About Lilith|About Senya|About us.
mirror_portrait;Schuri
speak;Schuri;We could have prevented this.|She could have lived.|We could have done better.
speak;MC;...but there's no what-ifs left for us.
speak;Schuri;.....but what if there was?|It's not completely unheard of.
speak;MC;That's is a dangerous line of thinking Schuri...
speak;Schuri;We can fix this.|...There was rumour where a wizard in the North.|He had holed himself for many years in attempt to revive his loved one.|And there was another mage who dabbled with time-
speak;MC;Wait, hold on. That's ridiculous.
speak;Schuri;We have a chance to right this.|It was our-, my fault.|I should have told you about control spells.|I should have considered Senya more.|I should have been stronger.
bop_portrait;Schuri
speak;Schuri;And...I have the ability to fix this.|No matter how long it will take, I'll......|I'll make it up to them.
speak;MC;I may not be fully on board...but she's really set on this.;;;thought_bubble
speak;MC;I'm in. I'll help you.
speak;Schuri;Are you sure? Once you start dabbling in these arts, there's no turning back.
speak;MC;I share the same regrets.|If we have the chance...
speak;Schuri;Great, I'll start the preparations then.
speak;Schuri;Perhaps this Chalice could prove useful...;;;thought_bubble
mirror_portrait;Schuri
speak;Schuri;Thank you for supporting me, {var:MC_name}.
expression;MC;HalfCloseEyes
move_portrait;Schuri;OffscreenRight
speak;;I suppose Schuri couldn't handle the loss of two of her closest people.|And started looking into dark magicks.|We eventually left the castle in search of the fabled mages.;;;narration_top
change_background;DeepForest
add_portrait;MC;Left
expression;MC;HalfCloseEyes
speak;;Schuri had dove deep into researching dark magicks in desparation.|Or was it despair?|Grief?|Obsession?|Or perhaps it already too late to stop?|Now, all I can do now is to be by her side when the storm passes.;;;narration_top
music;okEndingTheme
transition;close;2500
multi_remove_portrait;MC;Schuri
#ending cg?
change_background;default_background
transition;open;1000
speak;;Ending Achieved:|To The Cries of the Damned;center;;cinematic
set_next_chapter;2222
